docs.snippet: BERLIN, June 22 (AP). -- The 1936 Olympic Games at Berlin have drawn a record entry of fifty-three participating nations, the German Olympic Committee officially announced tonight after completing its listing of the entries, which closed Saturday.
docs.lead_paragraph: BERLIN, June 22 (AP). -- The 1936 Olympic Games at Berlin have drawn a record entry of fifty-three participating nations, the German Olympic Committee officially announced tonight after completing its listing of the entries, which closed Saturday.
docs.abstract: 53 nations to compete as entries close; 3 to have entries in all 23 events

headline.main: 53 NATIONS ENTER BERLIN OLYMPICS; Record Field to Compete, With U.S., Germany and Hungary in All 23 Events.

docs.snippet: LAKEHURST, N.J., June 23. -- With the rain pouring on her silver envelope increasing its weight by thousands of pounds, the airship Hindenburg sailed tonight for Germany. In her warm, bright cabins were fifty-seven passengers and with the crew there...
docs.lead_paragraph: LAKEHURST, N.J., June 23. -- With the rain pouring on her silver envelope increasing its weight by thousands of pounds, the airship Hindenburg sailed tonight for Germany. In her warm, bright cabins were fifty-seven passengers and with the crew there were more than 100 persons aboard when, at 11:24 o'clock, the dirigible backed away from her mooring mast and nosed up toward the low-hanging clouds.
docs.abstract: leaves Lakehurst on return flight in pouring rain; flies over N Y C; M Schmeling aboard; other passengers including 3 U S Naval officers

docs.snippet: GENEVA, July 2. -- Into the pleasant League of Nations arena of complacent oratory and verbal deviousness just after the Assembly closed this evening the Ethiopian delegation dropped a documentary bombshell that created a far greater stir than did...
docs.lead_paragraph: GENEVA, July 2. -- Into the pleasant League of Nations arena of complacent oratory and verbal deviousness just after the Assembly closed this evening the Ethiopian delegation dropped a documentary bombshell that created a far greater stir than did the Emperor's moving appeal the opening day.

headline.main: ETHIOPIA DEMANDS A VOTE ON HER FATE; Submits Proposal to Pledge Non-Recognition of Italy's Conquests in Africa.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, July 3. -- Exports increased to every major geographical division in May, and imports increased from all but South America and Oceania, the Department of Commerce announced today. Total exports for the month were valued at $200,666,000,...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, July 3. -- Exports increased to every major geographical division in May, and imports increased from all but South America and Oceania, the Department of Commerce announced today. Total exports for the month were valued at $200,666,000, compared with $165,459,000 in May, 1935, and imports were $191,110,000 and $170,533,000, respectively.

headline.main: MAY EXPORTS ROSE TO ALL COUNTRIES; Month's $200,666,000 Total Compared With Last Year's $165,459,000. IMPORTS ALSO INCREASED Department of Commerce Sets Value at $191,110,000, Against $170,533,000.

byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: The movement of the foreign exchanges last week was a restricted affair, contrasted with the feverish trend in preceding weeks. Only a small amount of business was involved and this was chiefly of a routine character, the holiday here at the week-end...
docs.lead_paragraph: The movement of the foreign exchanges last week was a restricted affair, contrasted with the feverish trend in preceding weeks. Only a small amount of business was involved and this was chiefly of a routine character, the holiday here at the week-end limiting interest.
